summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein, detailing charges for shipping services, including duty and tax charges. The invoice indicates a total amount due of $48.39 for services rendered on January 10, 2002, with delivery completed on January 14, 2002.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the recipient of the invoice for shipping services provided by FedEx, indicating his involvement in shipping activities.

persons.name: John Alessi
persons.context: John Alessi is mentioned as the shipper associated with the shipment linked to Jeffrey E. Epstein.

events.title: Shipment Date
events.description: A package was shipped on January 10, 2002, with delivery completed on January 14, 2002.

keyFacts: The invoice number is 7-131-27602, dated January 15, 2002.
Total charges on the invoice amount to $48.39, which includes duty and tax charges.
The shipment was sent via FedEx International Economy and was delivered on January 14, 2002.
John Alessi is listed as the shipper for the package associated with Jeffrey E. Epstein.
The invoice indicates that customs duties and taxes were paid to French Customs.
